description: This segment contains information that describes a payment made by a Payer organization.

1.name: Payment/Remittance Advice Number
1.description: Unique Payment/Remittance Advice number for the sending Network Application ID.

10.name: Payee Bank Account ID
10.data_type: CX - Extended Composite ID with Check Digit

11.name: Payment Organization
11.description: Organization identifier that made the Payment/Remittance Advice; could be a Payer, Insurance Company, TPA, Drug Company.
11.data_type: XON - Extended Composite Name and Identification Number for Organizations

12.name: ESR-Code-Line
12.description: Invoice Reference used with electronic banking methods.

2.name: Payment/Remittance Effective Date/Time
2.description: [ Start ] Date/Time for this Payment/Remittance Advice.

3.name: Payment/Remittance Expiration Date/Time
3.description: [ End ] Date/Time for this Payment/Remittance Advice.

4.name: Payment Method
4.description: Code identifying the method for the movement of payment. Refer to User-defined Table 0570 - Payment Method Code for suggested values.

5.name: Payment/Remittance Date/Time
5.description: Date Payment/Remittance Advice was paid, which might not be the same as Date/Time of Message on MSH.

6.name: Payment/Remittance Amount
6.description: Sum total of all Product/Service Paid Amount on PSL for this Payment/Remittance Advice, net of any Adjustments to Payee.

7.name: Check Number
7.description: Unique check number from the Payer's application system.

8.name: Payee Bank Identification
8.description: Identification of Payee's financial contact, e.g., name of the bank .
8.data_type: XON - Extended Composite Name and Identification Number for Organizations

9.name: Payee Transit Number
9.description: Personal ID of the payee used in financial transaction.
